spells.name: Find Quarry
spells.description: You can sense whether a particular creature is within 20 miles of your location.

spells.name: Judgment Light
spells.description: You gain an additional effect while a judgment is active.

spells.name: Litany of Escape
spells.description: Teleports a friend out of a grapple.

spells.name: Litany of Sight
spells.description: You can see invisible creatures and objects within 30 feet of you.

spells.name: Magic Siege Engine, Greater
spells.description: Siege engine gains +1 on targeting and damage rolls for every four caster levels.

spells.name: Named Bullet
spells.description: Imbues ammunition with accuracy against a specific creature type.

spells.name: Protection from Energy, Communal
spells.description: As protection from energy, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
